means: 不炫耀地，不招摇地，不装腔作势地

sentence.Network_en: She was unpretentiously dressed even though she was the guest of honor.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然她是主宾,但她的打扮仍然很朴素.

list.abs: and use clean and pure but true emotion , related an unpretentious love story for us . Mr.用纯洁而真实的情感,为我们讲述了一个朴实无华的爱情故事.
I continued in this unpretentious situation for nearly a year ., 我一直在这种朴实无华的景况中过了差不多一年.
an unpretentious country church ; her quiet unpretentious demeanor ., 朴实的乡间教堂 ; 她安静朴实的举止.
although she was wealthy , she lived in an unpretentious house .她虽然富有，住的却是朴素的房子。

sentences.sentence: "she was unpretentiously dressed even though she was the guest of honor"
